div.p:
Curia Capitalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem per ballivos
xxiijo die mensis aprilis Anno Domini Millesimo quadringentesimo octuagesimo septimo quo
die sectis vocatis et Curia affirmata absentes patent in Rotulo secte

div.head: Assa Assisa ad Inquisicionem Johannis andirson'
div.p:
Alexander chamer de murchile Johannes Culan alexander Rede Willelmus abirdour thomas mar
Johannes steuart Richardus Hill pater Robertus prat Andreas murray senior Dauid
mar' Willelmus tulidef Andreas Wentone Jacobus leslie A Walterus thome et Robertus
blinsell qui Jurati dicunt quod Johannes Jhonsone quondam andirsone pater Johannis
Jhoneson' latoris presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et saisitus ut de feodo ad fidem et
pacem domini nostri Regis de quadam terra jacente in le chaker raw inter terram
alexandri menyeis ex orientali ex vna et terram gilberti moreson ex occidentali partibus
ex altera et quod dictus Johannes est legittimus et propinquior heres quondam prefati patris
suj de predicta terra cum pertinenciis Et quod est legittime etatis Et quod dicta terra cum pertinenciis
valet nunc ad annum x lti s' et tantum valuit tempore pacis Et quod tenetur
de domino nostro Rege in Capite per seruicium burgale Et nunc existit in
manibus dicti Johannis Jhonson' per possessionem sibi traditam per thomam fyff
balliuum virtute suj officij datum et Clausum et cetera

div.head: Assisa ad Inquisicionem Agnetis Vmfray
div.p:
Jacobus leslie Robertus blinsell Johannes Cullane Johannes Knollis Willelmus
abirdour Willelmus blinsell thomas mar' Andreas murray senior Dauid
mar' Willelmus tulydef Andreas Wentone Walterus thome Robertus prat
Richardus Hill pater et Johannes steuarte qui Jurati dicunt quod quondam
gilbertus leche auus Agnetis Vmfray latricis presencium obiit vltimo vestitus
et saisitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis de quadam
terra sine tenemento Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico furcarum ex orientali parte
eiusdem vici inter terram Johannis grige ex australi ex vna et terram quondam
dominj Alexandri Younge ex boreali partibus ex altera et communiones vias regias versus occi
dens et oriens et tempore sui decessus habuit filium legittime procreatum Johannes vocatum
et non constat de morte eius quia extra regnum est Et post eiusdem filij decessum dictam agnes est
vna de legittimis et propinquioribus heredibus dicti aui sui de dicta terra cum pertinenciis
et dicta Agnes est legittime etatis et dicta terra cum pertinenciis valet nunc per annum iiijor marcas
et tantum valuit tempore pacis Et quod tenetur de domino nostro Rege in capite per seruicium
burgale Et nunc existit in manibus mariorie leche Cristine leche et margarete
leche filiarum quondam dicti gilberti in Custodia ad aduentum dicti Johannis leche fratris suj
de mandato suppremj dominj nostri Regis per suas litteras datum et clausum et cetera

Quo die Johannes chene prelocutorio nomine Johannis andirson protestatus fuit quicquid dictum
actum sine factum fuerit per dictam assisam non cedat ipsi Johanne andirson in preiudicium
in postrum penes annuum redditum per ipsum clamatum

The samyne day thomas quhit tutor to Dauid quhit sone and ayr of vmquhile
gilbert quhit and appering ayr to Robert quhit perofferit him reddy to content
ande pay to the saide Robert tene markis in hande And' ane yer being' runnyn'
to content and deliuer him xxti markis gif he nedis to his honest sustentacion protestand'
that he annaly nocht his saide lande lyand' in the gallougate And' gif he pretendit
to do ony thing tharintill that it suld' nocht turne the said' Dauid in preiudice in
tym' cuminge tuechinge his heritage

Eodem die Religiosus vir frater petrus striuelin minister domus Sancte trinitatis de Abirdene protestatus fuit
pro vno annuo redditu xxxti d' eedem eidem domui et sibi debit' de quodam orto vasto iuxta dictum
locum Sancte trinitatis Jacente ex parte orientali Cimiterij eiusdem et torrentem sancte trinitatis ex australi ad
quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos in sacculo presentauit
ballivis in Curia tanquam secundo die huius processus Testibus Roberto Kyntor thoma chap
man et philippo de Dunbrek seriando

Eodem die dominus matheus nicholson capellanus et procurator altaris beati petri apostolorum principis
infra ecclesiam beati nicholaij cituati accedens ad barram protestatus fuit pro vno annuo Redditu
viginti solidorum eidem altari et capellano eiusdem annuatim debit' de quadam terra Jacente
in vico furcarum ex parte orientali eiusdem vici inter terram quondam Walteri pyot ex australi
parte et terram quondam thome croudan' ex boriali parte Ad quam terram accedens nichil
reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos in sacculo ballivis presentavit in curia tanquam tercio die huius
processus testibus Willelmo cuminge Alexandro ranison et Duncano straloche seriando

Eodem die Dominus Andreas henrici capellanus altaris beati nicholaij accessit ad duas terras collatas Jacentes in
le gastraw inter terram Dauid talyour ex australi et terram mathei Wricht ex boreali et protestatus fuit pro vno
annuo Redditu vj s' et viij d' annuatim debit' et nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo
presentauit in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Roberto Kintor Roberto hunter et philpo Dunbrek
seriando

In the said Court haldin the xxiij day of aprile the yer forsaide Comperit Alexander hill
sone and ayr to Jhone of hill of the grene and offerit him reddy to sustene and vp
hald his fadir in mett drink and clatht and to pay ande outrede his dettis and to beit
his neide and mystir in ale honest nedis And' gif his fadir wald annaly or put
avay his lande to ony persone sene he is redy to do to his fadir ale that law will
he protestit quhat his fadir dois tharintill turne him nor his heritage to nay preiudice
in tyme to Cum

the samyn day it was ordanit be the aldirman and consaile that nay landman sale
gif straik of meile in tyme to Cum And' the tollar' sale haue euere Reddy firlot
pek and demi pek

The samyn day henry scheral sone and ayr to vmquhil henry scheral quiet'cla
mit Jhone chene his ayris executoris and assignez for him his ayris executoris and assignez of
iiijxx merkis that he resauit of his gudis And' of al vthir gudis that euere he Intromettit
with and procurit thomas fyffis seile to the said' acquitance befor thar witnes the minister
of the triniteis sere Wilyeam mvresone Johne andirson malcum of gardin philp
Dunbrek and sere Jhone striueling' notar And' atour he promittit fathtfully to set to the
saide Jhone chen' the tua partis of his landis of balmacasy for fiwe yeris eftir he
be in lauchfull sesin of the samyn

The samyn day Jhone of Kintor bade Dauid mar' mak a bile of charge
that he wald mak fatht was sicalik bile as he gaf him obefor eftir the deliuerance
of ane assis' obefor And' the balyeis assignit friday that next cumis to the presentacion of the said
bill
In the court haldin the xxvj day of aprile the yer' forsaide be the balyeis et cetera

div.head: Assisa ad Inquisicionem margarete traile
div.p:
Jacobus leslie Dauid menyes Junior Johannes Colysone Andreas murray senior
gilbertus moreson Alexander traile Johannes Chapman thomas gardin' et Jacobus
Crag qui jurati dicunt quondam Johannes traile frater margarete traile latricis presencium
obiit vltimo vestitus et cetera de dimidio vnius terre vaste Jacentis in vico superioris
ecclesie in le skulhill ex boreali parte eiusdem vici inter terram quondam alexandri fynne ex orientali
ex vna et terram quondam Alexandri skynner ex occidentali partibus ex altera et dicta margareta
est propinquior heres eiusdem Johannis de dicto dimidio terre et valet xij d' annuatim et cetera
deseruitur dictum bene in omnibus punctis

the samyn day gilbert moreson and Alexander traile cum souerte be thar handis and drew
thar landis and gudis souerte to pay four' markis to the saide Jhon' traile gif
it happinnis him to cum hame becaus' the saide demi land was wast and habile
to haue bene Recouerit be proces' in defalt of pament of the annuell and sauld'
for foure markis be the avis' of the said alexander traile his tutor and vtheris his nerrast
frendis to the profit of the saide Jhone traile And to keip thome of meldrum his ayris
and assignez skathles' foreuire thar anent

The said day Wilyeame Andirson' eldar forspekar of ane assis' chosin betuix Jhone
Waus and Androw goldsmytht anent the bigyne of ane hed dyk / decretit and deliuerit
that the saide hed dik is the saide Jhon' the Waus' And safar as is castyne done
salbe bigitupe agane be the saide Jhone as it is merkit evyne to the conye of the
saide Androuis hous'

the xxviij day of aprile the yer forsaide the aldirman consale and communite has ordanit
decretit and deliuerit to writ to the tone of Danskyne and the borowmasteris and skevinnis
of that Ilk to peroffir to content and pay al somes of money and gudis avand' tham be
ony of our nichtbuiris And' gif ony offens' or iniuris be done to ony merchandis
or nichtburis of tharis be ony of ouris tile amend' it at al thar gudly pouer'

the saide day the aldirman was ordanit be the consale present for the tyme to pay
xl s' to Robert themdaile for the hors' that deit quhen thai wrat to my lord of
eroll anent the lyme that his lordschipe desirit

the samyne day it was deliuerit be the aldirman and consale present for the tyme
that James leslie mycht bige apone the wastlande ennew the yet quhar
gilbert of chavmer duellis
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem per balliuos quarto die maij anno Domini et cetera lxxxvijo

the samyne day Williame forbes lauchlansone and his complicis Wille landalis
Androu tailyour Malcum and Jame Cultis was conviccerit conuiccit be ane assis' of the best
and worthiast of the tone for the wranguis' oppressione and mastirfull strubulance
of puir folkis one the day and vndir Cilence of nicht batht in the burghe' and futy
And for the wranguis' avay takin of thar fische at thar hous' and at thar watteris
And' for the wranguis' strubulance and oppressione of the kingis liegeis cumand'
to the mercat and passand' tharfra Ande for the wranguis' gathtring inbringin
mantening forceseing and sustening of evill douaris brokin and vnlauchfull folkis
to the oppressione of the kingis puyr' liegis And for commone nicht wakinge
wranguislie Ande for the wranguis' out takin of mene out of thar hous'
vndir Cilence of the nicht

the samyne day mage vocat was conuikit be ane assis' for art part rede
consaile and assistence of the forsaide crimys and faltis And it was ordanit
decretit and deliuerit be the aldirman and haile consale gif euire scho beis conuikit
for sic faltis eftiruart that scho salbe banyst of the tone

It was concludit at the hile one maij day be the aldirman balyeis
and consale that Robert huchosone salbe mastir of the gramar'
sangscule And Richerd' boile sale teche and Instruk vndir him And
the profitis that beis gottin tharof salbe referrit to the disposicone of Ro
bert blinsell ande Dauid menyeis yongar And atour thai grantit
to gif to the saide Robert tuenty pundis for his continiale gude seruice to be made
in the kyrk of Abirdene for ane yeris seruice next eftir follouing

Septimo die mensis maij anno ut supra In presencia prepositi et alexandri chamer
balliui Johannes currour' de banf fecit constituit et creauit Johannem Coleson
suum procuratorem legittimum ad petendum exigendum et recipiendum a Johanne
steuynson' firmas vnius crofti sibi debitas de tribus annis elapsis et de
receptis acquitan' dand' et deliberand' Et si necesse fuerit eundem Johannem
prosequend' et cetera in vberiore forma procuratorij promittens de Rato grato cum
omnibus clausulis ad procuratorium necessariis et oportunis

xijo die mensis maij quo supra In presencia thome prat ballivi margareta eviot
senior et margareta eviot Junior filie et heredes quondam Roberti eviot fecerunt
prouidum virum Jacobum leslie magistrum Richardum crafurde magistrum alexandrum fyf
magistrum Andream byssat et dominum Andream eviot coniuncti coniunctim et diuisim suos procuratores legitimos
ad petendum exigendum et recipiendum nomine suo saisinam hereditariam omni terrarum
annuorum Reddituum sibi spectan' necnon ad petendum accipiendum et requirendum omnia et
singula bona sibi Jure hereditario aut alias per decessum parentum suorum pertinen' a quibuscumque
personis et de receptis acquitan' dand' detinen' vero si necesse fuerit prosequen'
in vberiore forma procuratorij promittens de Rato et grato et cetera testibus alexandro abirdour
Duncano abirdour et Johanne byssat

In curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xiiijto die maij anno ut supra compertum fuit per Inquisicionem
quod margareta eviot senior et margareta eviot Junior sunt filie et heredes legittime et propinqui
ores quondam Roberti eviot patris sui Et consequenter dicta margareta senior constituit et creauit
magistrum Richardum crafurde suum procuratorem legittimum ad petendum exigendum et recipiendum omnia et
singula bona sibi Jure hereditario aut alias per decessum parentum suorum pertinen' Et dicta
margareta Junior creauit et fecit Jacobum leslie et dominum Andream eviot capellanum suos procuratores coniunctim
et diuisim legittimos ad petendum et recipiendum vniuersa bona sibi Jure hereditario contingen' aut
alias per decessum parentum suorum a quibuscumque personis et de receptis acquitandis dandis detinendis
vero prosequend' in vberiore forma procuratorij promittens de Rato et grato non obstan' procuratorio precedente
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvijo die maij vt supra

The samyne day it was ordanit and statut be the aldirman consale and merchand mene
that al burges that salis sal cum in continent and remane within the tone and haf buytht and
chamer and thar merchandis' salbe put tharintile And' that nane pas' one in the land
to by woll hidis or skyne And' quhay beis conuikit tharin sale pay to the repara
cione of the key and kyrk werk fiwe markis And' the accusacion tharapone to be
maide be the aldirman and balyeis Ilkan xv dais and the vnlawis to be resauit be
thomas prat And' atour thai haue ordanit that souerte be tane of tham that ar
duellaris vteuth' the tone to cum and remane in the tone in continent Wat thomson
become souerte for Androu mureson / Androu murray eldar souerte for Androw Wat
sone and I Duncan lundoris for Jhone fechile

The samyne day the aldirman and consale present for the tyme ats request
of our Souerane lordis lettres admittit mastir Wilyeame strathachin to the grammar'
sculis of Abirdene for ane yer'

head.add: Mastir Richerd crafurd and W portar

div.p:
the samyne day it was deliuerit be ane assis' Dauid mathosone
forspekar that the auentour of the rest of the siluer pertening to Wilyeam
portar that mastir Richerde crafurde gert arrest in flandris is gane
in the saide mastir Richerdis defalt And' he sal mak pament of the
samyn to the saide Wilyeame eftir the tenor' of his bile of waring
gevin to his merchande tharapone within terme of law

the saide day it was decretit and ordanit be the saide assis' Dauid matheson'
forspekar that mastir Richerde crafurde sale deliuer to Richerd' hile
the sone the bile of fyfty s' g' that he gaf him

xixo die maij anno ut supra In presencia prepositi et thome prat balliui Willelmus
cambell in Deipe fecit constituit et ordinauit Robertum blinsell Johannem blak
et thomam catall suos procuratores legittimos coniunctim et diuisim in vberiore forma
procuratorij ad petendum exigendum et recipiendum a Willelmo blinsell duas barrellas
salmonum sibi debitas et de receptis acquitan' dand' Et si necesse fuerit eundem
coram quocumque Judice competen' prosequend' promittens de Rato et grato cum omnibus
clausulis ad procuratorium necessariis et oportunis cum potestate componend' et cetera

the xxi day of maij forsaid In presens of the aldirman and Androw cullan
bailye it is appuntit and accordit betuix Wilyeame blinsell one that ane
part and thomas catall procuratoris to Wilyeame cambell one that vthir part In maner and
forme as eftir follouis that is to say the said' Wilyeame blinsell sal pay
and deliuer to the said thomas tua dakir of hidis merchand gude tharof viij
oxin hidis and xij ky hidis be the next sonday for the ij barrel of salmond' cla
myt one the said Wilyeam cambellis behalf And' the said' thomas sal pay
xxti s' of siluer to the said' Wilyeam at the resat of the hidis and deliuer him his pece
of clathtis
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xxvo die maij ut supra

the quhilk day the balyeis ordanit morice byssat and Duncan straloche
officaris to warne Jhone of Kyntor to comper befor tham the next monunday
to ansuer to Dauid mar' as day of peremptouris anent the pament of tua barrel
of Salmond' eftir the tenor' of the akis gane obefor

The samyne day Anne smytht the wyf of Jhone smytht conuict' for the
strubulance of morice byssat in the execucione of his office and to amende as
law wile

The samyne day it was fundin and deliuerit be ane assis' alexander chamer of murchile forspekar
that the videw of Jhone Waus was maide quyt of the wranguis' occupacion
of the fischingis of ane half neth' of the mydchingile as yet And' thomas
Waus in Amerciament of the court for the wranguis' borche strekin apon hir'

the quhilk day it was ordanit deliuerit and decret be warde of the court that
Wilyeame quelp sal ansuer' to Androu Culane yongar for xxiij s' of lent
siluer and for a coket makin and the parchement of the samyn one monunday cum xv
dais as day of peremptour

Item the saide day it was statut and ordanit be the aldirman balyeis and certan
of consal present for the tyme that nay catall sale haf pastour' of gyrs'
apone the lynkis nor nane vthir place one this syde of gilkamstone except'
the flesseris wederis And thai to be pundaris and to haf j d' for Ilkan best
that thai fynd' thar'
Curia balliuorum tenta per balliuos xxviijo die maij anno ut supra

Quo die medy heruy sponsa fyndelaij fores conuictus fuit per confessionem lingue
proprie pro iniusta brasiacione seruicie xij d' contra communia statuta et in amerciamento curie
pro huiusmodi defectu et in futurum ad decistendum sub pena Juris qua competere poterit

Eodem die Adam Duncanson in Amerciamento curie pro perturbio Andree Ker' et emendabit
parti ut Jura volunt et Idem Andreas in amerciamento pro perturbio dicti Ade et emendabit
ut Jura petunt

Eodem die Willelmus goldsmytht deuenit plegius legalis quod prefatus Andreas
Ker' erit Indempnis pro eo aliter quam per viam Juris et Andreas andirsone
deuenit plegius legalis quod predictus Adam erit Indempnis pro dicto
Andrea aliter quam viam Juris

In the balye Court of Abirdene the first day of June the yer' forsaide comperit
William scherar sone to vmquhile Canny Rollande and protestit quhat thing'
beis done anent the lande of vmquhile Wilyeam Rolland his grantsere turne
him to nay preiudice

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem ixo die mensis Junij anno ut supra
comparuit georgius heruy filius et heres quondam Jacobi heruy cum Dauid
ogiluy de tolmade suo prelocutore et proposuit quod alias dominus thomas heruy
capellanus auunclus suus tradi fecit quandam pretensam saisinam que intrusio citius diti
debet venerabili in christo patri Abbati de Deyr de quibusdam terris sibi contingentibus'
infra eundem burgum Jacentem quequidem pretensa saisina expresse exhibiter fuit
que Juris ordinem ut asseruit qua propter dictus Dauid nomine prelocutorio quosupra solempniter
protestatus fuit quod huiusmodi possessionis pretense exhibicio non cedat eidem georgio aut suis
heredibus in aliquod preiudicium in postrum quo ad feodum et hereditem suam In superdictus
georgius produxit et publice perlegi fecit quandam litteram testimonialem manu quondam
magistri Johannis cadiow scriptam Sigilloque quondam Johannis Kyntor vnius balliuorum
eiusdem burgi sigillant proportan' quod quondam honesta mulier edana relicta
quondam Duncani hervy burgensis eiusdem burgi cum domino thoma hervy capellano
suo filio primogenito astante et consensiente resignauit quandam terram que fuit quondam
dominj Willelmi Roust capellani fratris sui Jacentem infra dictum burgum ex parte boriali vici
tendent' a foro publico versus domum Sancte trinitatis inter terram que fuit olim
Richardi Ruderfurde ex orientali ex vna et communionem viam regiam qua Itur
ab orientali cono eiusdem ecclesie per Ripam torrentis ab aqueductis molendinorum
decurrentis ex occidentali partibus ex altera in manibus ipsius Johannis Kintor et
consequenter fecit saisinam et possessionem hereditarias eiusdem terre Jacobo hervy et eli
zibeth' sponse sue tradi et deliberari in coniuncta infeodacione prout in eadem
plenius continetur

The samyn day alexander Rede procurator for the Abbat and conuent of Deyr' askit
the lande that sere thomas hervy now Inhabitis to be schavin strenye
abile to him for the annuell acht to the saide place and he sulde provude provide
for it

In the bailye Court of Abirdene the xvi day of June forsaide Allane
steuynsone in Amerciament' of Court for the distrubulance of meg liale and to
Amend' to hir as law wil And' atour it was ordanit and deliuerit be ane
assise gif euire the saide Allane beis conuikit for sic faltis in tymez to
cum that he salbe bannyst out of the tone

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xviijo die Junij anno ut
supra

The quhilk day Morice byssat officiar at commavnde of the aldirman
and balyeis deliuerit to Williame cryne j jak quhilk was prefit thre four
merkat dais for vi s' acht to the saide Wilyeame be Jhone steuin
sone And the said Wilyeam pait xvi d' to the saide officiar' for his fee
And' the saide Wilyeam perofferit the saide Jak tile ony man that walde
pay him his siluer protestand' that he tak nay skatht tharfor in tymez
to cum

the quhilk day Robert of buchan in Jugement disassentit that euere
Jhone Waus haf ony fee of his gudis bot gif he consent tharto

In the balye court haldin the xix day of June forsaid Jhone fechat grantit
thwa'wa' overwrites 're'? byrssin pottis and thre chandlaris of Alexander monepennys' and to do tharfor that efferis
within xv dais And the bailye chargit the saide Jhone to pay the saide gudis
within terme of law
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem vicesimo die mensis Junij anno ut supra

the quhilk day Androw Cullane balye at commavnd of the aldirman and certane of
the Consale chargit Jhone malisone to Remane within the tolbutht quhile
he pait xvi s' g' in to Jhone of Kyntor optenit apone him be ane decret

In the Court haldin the xxij day of June the yer forsaide the balyeis
assignit to Dauid mar monunday that next cumis to bring thome scot and
preif pament of xiiij s' to William abirdour or to his wif and falyeing tharof
the saide Dauid' is dettour for the saide siluer
